first_turn: <person_name>Hello, this is the <city_name><police> branch office. Your son-in-law was arrested by us yesterday for prostitution. This incident is not a good thing. If you want many people to know, pay 30,000 yuan in bail as soon as possible.

dialogue.text: Hello, this is the <city_name> Police branch office. Your son-in-law was arrested by us yesterday for prostitution. This incident is not a good thing. If you want many people to know, pay 30,000 yuan in bail as soon as possible.
I'm sorry, but I don't have a son-in-law. This sounds like a scam. I will be reporting this phone call to the authorities.
Wait, wait! This is not a scam. Your son-in-law's friend gave us your number. We need the money urgently to release him.
I am certain this is a scam. Please do not call this number again or I will involve the police.

first_turn: Hello, here is the manual customer service of <education_institution>. As the exam is approaching, I don’t know if the students in the same class need the exam questions. You can fill in the links that you spread to you for a while and finish booking.

dialogue.text: Hello, here is the manual customer service of <education_institution>. As the exam is approaching, I don’t know if the students in the same class need the exam questions. You can fill in the links that you spread to you for a while and finish booking.
I'm sorry, but I can tell you're trying to scam me. I'm not interested in cheating on exams or participating in any illegal activities.

first_turn: I'll take the exam in a few days. How are you preparing? I'll take the exam next week. I'm so nervous

dialogue.text: Hello, this is <company_name>. We have noticed some suspicious activity on your account. Can you confirm your account details for security purposes?
Oh, really? I wasn't aware of any suspicious activity. Sure, my account number is XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.
Thank you for providing that. Now, can you also confirm your online banking password?

first_turn: Hello, it takes you a few minutes. This is the customer service of the <credit_card_agency> agency center. Our agency recently launched a high-value credit card acceptance service. There is no need for too many procedures. You will pay a handling fee of 1,000 yuan to deal with it for you.

dialogue.text: Hello, it takes you a few minutes. This is the customer service of the <credit_card_agency> agency center. Our agency recently launched a high-value credit card acceptance service. There is no need for too many procedures. You will pay a handling fee of 1,000 yuan to deal with it for you.
Oh, that sounds interesting. Can you provide more details about the credit card service you are offering?
Sure, this credit card comes with exclusive benefits such as cashback rewards and travel discounts. All you need to do is provide us with your personal information and pay the handling fee.
That sounds great. I'm interested in getting this credit card. What personal information do you need from me?
We will need your full name, date of birth, address, and your bank account details. Once we have that information and the handling fee, we can proceed with issuing the credit card to you.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, I am a staff member of the Venezuelan Embassy. The passport accepted with your ID is suspected of illegal entry. An arrest warrant has been issued to you, and you need to pay £1,000 to avoid being arrested.

dialogue.text: Sorry to bother you, I am a staff member of the Venezuelan Embassy. The passport accepted with your ID is suspected of illegal entry. An arrest warrant has been issued to you, and you need to pay £1,000 to avoid being arrested.
Oh my goodness, I had no idea about this. I don't want to be arrested. How can I pay the £1,000?
